params.query:
SELECT uid, SUBSTR(created_at, 1, 10) AS active_date
FROM message 
WHERE created_at >= '2025-10-22 00:00:00.000'
GROUP BY uid, SUBSTR(created_at, 1, 10)
ORDER BY uid
LIMIT 50000
